alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Knox; Morrow; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 5:55PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Richland, southwestern Ashland, southeastern Morrow and central Knox Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 555 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Centerburg, or 12 miles northeast of Westerville, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Vernon, Loudonville, Fredericktown, Bellville, Centerburg, Sparta, Butler, Perrysville, Lucas, Mifflin and North Liberty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Ohio. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central Ohio.
